name: Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board

details.exam_description: The Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination is a state-level entrance examination conducted by the Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board.

Details: Candidates who have passed with grace marks, only actual marks obtained by the candidates shall be counted. Grace marks awarded to him are not to be considered / counted.
Recognized or permitted Institutes / Colleges are to be treated similarly.
If a candidate has joined service (i.e. is in BHS) before last date of receipt of application, he is to be considered as BHS for all purposes.
Result declared after last date of receipt of application will not be entertained. Last date of the month on which examination was held is to be treated as date of passing.
All candidates have to produce their failure marks sheet. Unable to do so will make his candidature as Not Eligible.
For all foreign graduates, marks awarded in NBE conducted eligibility exam (FDST) are to be used for calculation for all purposes. Marks of his Degree will not be considered.
Candidates having obtained higher qualification (Super specialization) in related course are to be taken into consideration for awarding points.
All such candidates who are working as lecturer or Asst. Prof. (without doing SR ) are to be considered eligible for SR .
Candidates who have not submitted Non Creamy Layer Caste Certificate during couselling / documents verification are to be considered as UR candidates.
Every eligible candidate has to submit an affidavit stating that He / She has never been appointed and completed the 3 years tenure post of SR in applied subject.

details.exam_description: BiHAR Combined Engineering College Entrance Examination
